list_of_reviews.review_title: Account locked due to hack
list_of_reviews.review: Last Wednesday my account is frozen due to a hack. I requested it myself and, to be honest, the support via live chat was superb. So, thanks for that! Unfortunately, after asking me to send over some personal information with pictures and a video, I haven't heard anything from the support team. Is there anyone from the support team who is able to look into my ticket? The ticket number is 09189652. It would help me a lot if someone is able to look into this. On one side because I don't have access to my account at this point, but on the other hand because I see some serious risks at this point. Thanks in advance.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I read a lot bad comments
list_of_reviews.review: I read a lot bad comments. I’m “VIP” 4 or was until last week on BYBIT. The vip thing is just a PR thing. I’ve asked a few questions the “devoted”😂 vip manager some questions, either I got an answer with a bad attitude or the response comes after 2-3 days, The benefit of VIP is that the que to chat is 1-2minutes. However chat always says “the right team will contact you very quickly since you are a VIP” Well I have not got any response from “right team” so far.  The extra gifts is nothing to be excited over 😂, deposit over 100k past months extra gift has been 300usd. The positive is the App, which is very easy to manage.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scam company

Worst company and support ever.CEO Ben Zhou should be ashamedCompliance Jonathan C should be ashamedLegal Emily Choi should be ashamedStill they don’t send professional to help. No number to call. Overall criminal behavior. Don’t ever use this platform.

list_of_reviews.review: Worst customer service ever by far !!!1 month waiting for a ticket reply cos my card got blocked and as that wasnt bad enough they closed the ticket and after I complained waiting another 2 weeks without a single word. list_of_reviews.review_title: P2P APPEAL
list_of_reviews.review: P2P APPEAL It's been almost one month since I had an appeal of $2317 on Bybit. I wanted to buy USDT with someone, I paid the seller, and he received the money. He didn't release my asset, and he also didn't want to send me back my money. and bybit customer support is not doing anything. I text them, I dont know how many times, and support is still silent. This is the order number: 1767603290511396864.I need help to get my money back or for the seller to release my asset. He is also trying to scam me more again, telling me to send $1300 to his USDT address and then releasing it. You, as customer support, can see all that, and you are still not doing anything about my asset.This is My UID is 63464066UPDATE :The seller is telling me that he will not refund my money. UPDATE 2: The order was completed , and customer support released my asset.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Always one week with hold money
list_of_reviews.review: Opening the account I sent all the required documents for a Lv.2 account, first transaction one week with holded money for send the bank statement (I sent before but they wanted the one with the top up operation). They loose time keeping time to ask you what they need.When done 2 days for withdrawal.You change into BTC and only when you want to change back you discover that you need a minimum amount for change / withdraw.Today I need only to send 50 USDT and there is a message that they need more documents for my account as per e-mail (not received). The support send me an e-mail that link to the ticket area (that is empty, no tickets). As always they take times for hold money.Totally bad experience. DON'T USE BYBIT.

However, if the reviews were similar to those mentioned for Coinbase, common themes might include account restrictions, poor customer service, and technical issues, leading to user dissatisfaction. Satisfaction might stem from successful trades and prompt withdrawals.

prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to a range of reviews over different dates, so I cannot analyze trends or changes in user sentiment or issue types over time.

prompts_output.Output: I don't have specific reviews for Bybit.com to analyze. The context provided only pertains to Coinbase, not Bybit.com. Therefore, I cannot extract key phrases or words from reviews for Bybit.com without additional information.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have access to the actual ratings or a numerical dataset to calculate an average rating or analyze the distribution of ratings. The reviews provided are mixed, with some users expressing satisfaction and others dissatisfaction, but without numerical ratings, I cannot perform a quantitative analysis.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Generate concise summaries for each review to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
1. Users warn against the company, highlighting untrustworthy practices and poor customer service.
6. Users advise caution, implying there may be problems with the company's services or practices.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews praise successful trading and prompt withdrawals, while negative reviews criticize account closures, poor customer service, and technical issues. Key differentiators are the reliability of service and quality of customer support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the bybit.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have specific information on Bybit.com's customer support interactions, as the context provided only pertains to Coinbase. Therefore, I cannot gauge the effectiveness or responsiveness of the Bybit.com support team.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Based on the review sentiments and contents, predict potential future issues bybit.com might face or areas where they could improve. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Bybit.com could face issues with user trust and legal scrutiny if they don't improve customer service, clarify account suspension reasons, and expedite resolutions. Enhancing transparency and support responsiveness is crucial.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Identify any outliers or unusual reviews that deviate significantly from the general consensus, which might warrant further investigation. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Based on the provided context, there are no outlier reviews presented. All reviews share a negative sentiment towards the company, citing issues with customer service, account restrictions, and a lack of resolution.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews indicate a company with a mixed reputation, where some customers have had positive experiences, particularly with successful trades and prompt withdrawals, suggesting that the company's core services can be effective. However, there are significant concerns about untrustworthy practices and poor customer service, which are recurring themes in user warnings. Critical issues raised by dissatisfied customers include account closures and technical problems with the platform, which are serious impediments to a seamless user experience. The contrast between the positive and negative feedback suggests that the company's reliability and customer support are key differentiators that could be improved. Further investigation into the company's practices, as well as a more structured approach to addressing customer service complaints, could be beneficial in resolving these issues and improving overall user satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review: This app know how to manipulate people. I tend to think all their order books are manipulated by bots. When you trade in demo account the prices are good and you even develop a system, wait until you go live and they start manipulate prices. Their spot market is a total scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support team have no accountability
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange and it's support team seems to think ERC20 and Ethereum Mainnet are synonymous. They are not. There are many chains that support ERC20 tokens. On Bybit's deposit page, they list ERC20 as a "Chain" you can deposit to, which is completely ambiguous because many chains support ERC20. Once you deposit your funds to a chain that supports ERC20 (In my case Base chain), they do not show up, because the only supported chain is actually Ethereum Mainnet, and the support team take no accountability. This is extremely poor...I spent 3 days arguing with support about whether the name of Ethereum Mainnet is ERC20 or not. You need to skill your support team up - they are completely incapable...To add a cherry on top, they say it will take 7 more working days to send the funds back - but in the meantime they completely closed my support ticket, so I had to open a new one.Avoid this exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bybit trying not to pay rewards/ commission they promised

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bybit: A Surefire Way to Get Scammed
list_of_reviews.review: Bybit is hands down the most untrustworthy exchange I've ever had the displeasure of dealing with. If you're looking for a guaranteed way to get scammed, look no further.My recent experience with Bybit has been a nightmare from start to finish. I deposited a significant amount of crypto into my account, expecting to use it for trading opportunities. Little did I know, that deposit would vanish into thin air, never to be seen again.Despite reaching out to Bybit's supposed "customer support" multiple times, I have yet to receive a single response. It's crystal clear that they have no intention of helping their customers or addressing their concerns. They take your money and run, leaving you high and dry with no recourse.Dealing with Bybit is not just a risk, it's practically a guarantee that you'll be scammed. They lure you in with promises of easy trading and quick profits, but the reality is far from it. They're nothing but a bunch of crooks running a shady operation.Save yourself the headache and avoid Bybit like the plague. Trust me, you'll thank yourself later. There are plenty of reputable exchanges out there that actually value their customers and prioritize their needs. Bybit is not one of them. Stay far, far away.Case ID: 09412236

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews primarily highlight advancements in technology, specifically the integration of AI and NFTs, indicating a strong interest in the intersection of cutting-edge tech with the digital asset space. Market growth is another focal point, with discussions centered on staking mechanisms and updates within various ecosystems, suggesting a community keen on exploring and expanding the utility and value of their investments. Community news, including project introductions and strategies for resilience, reflects an engaged and proactive community aiming to foster growth and sustainability. For a more rounded discourse, future discussions could benefit from incorporating regulatory perspectives and market predictions to provide a comprehensive view of the digital asset landscape and its potential trajectory.

list_of_reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY!! NEGATIVE EXPERIENCE!
list_of_reviews.review: I was scammed by a seller. made a sepa payment, on the middle of the nigh on friday he opened a ticket asking me to cancel the order when i had paid. unfortunately i didnt check earlier because i was out with my family all the weekend plus knowing that nothing happens on weekend i thought to check on monday. the agent of bybit, probably working with this scammer, cancelled the order even why it doesnt make any logical sense because no sepa transfers are done on weekends. i opened an ticket with bybit but they didnt even answer so far for 3 days. i think bybit agents are collaborating with these scammers, i lost 1500 eur, of course i will live this out. i am just disappointed by the attitude of bybit support and to understand how unsafe all this is. stay away from bybit and bybit p2p service. you are not protectec. list_of_reviews.review_title: This app know how to manipulate people
list_of_reviews.review: This app know how to manipulate people. I tend to think all their order books are manipulated by bots. When you trade in demo account the prices are good and you even develop a system, wait until you go live and they start manipulate prices. Their spot market is a total scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support team have no accountability
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange and it's support team seems to think ERC20 and Ethereum Mainnet are synonymous. They are not. There are many chains that support ERC20 tokens. On Bybit's deposit page, they list ERC20 as a "Chain" you can deposit to, which is completely ambiguous because many chains support ERC20. Once you deposit your funds to a chain that supports ERC20 (In my case Base chain), they do not show up, because the only supported chain is actually Ethereum Mainnet, and the support team take no accountability. This is extremely poor...I spent 3 days arguing with support about whether the name of Ethereum Mainnet is ERC20 or not. You need to skill your support team up - they are completely incapable...To add a cherry on top, they say it will take 7 more working days to send the funds back - but in the meantime they completely closed my support ticket, so I had to open a new one.Avoid this exchange.

If such situation happens regularly one can trade p2p on bybit. Very bad image it creates . Uid.  16369437Update: Still the issue isn't delt with . Day 9th, No progress what's so ever.Day 10th , No progress Day 11th , No progressDay 12th , No progress Day 13th , issue solved

list_of_reviews.review_title: Useless  for buying crypto in Asia
list_of_reviews.review: Forget trying to buy crypto on this site if you are in any asian country. It is useless. All they offer is purchase by credit card. You are asked to enter your name. I am in Taiwan. My credit card name is in English. My ID (which was used for the KYC) is in Chinese. They won't let you enter your name in Chinese when adding the card. Thus when it goes to process the transaction it fails because the name on the ID and the card don't match. KYC is supposed to be used to prevent money laundering. This purchase is for less than $100 US. I am sure money launderers are making $100 deposits (/sarc) . There should be a threshhold above a certain amount  where KYC has to be used.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bybit: A Surefire Way to Get Scammed
list_of_reviews.review: Bybit is hands down the most untrustworthy exchange I've ever had the displeasure of dealing with. If you're looking for a guaranteed way to get scammed, look no further.My recent experience with Bybit has been a nightmare from start to finish. I deposited a significant amount of crypto into my account, expecting to use it for trading opportunities. Little did I know, that deposit would vanish into thin air, never to be seen again.Despite reaching out to Bybit's supposed "customer support" multiple times, I have yet to receive a single response. It's crystal clear that they have no intention of helping their customers or addressing their concerns. They take your money and run, leaving you high and dry with no recourse.Dealing with Bybit is not just a risk, it's practically a guarantee that you'll be scammed. They lure you in with promises of easy trading and quick profits, but the reality is far from it. They're nothing but a bunch of crooks running a shady operation.Save yourself the headache and avoid Bybit like the plague. Trust me, you'll thank yourself later. There are plenty of reputable exchanges out there that actually value their customers and prioritize their needs. Bybit is not one of them. Stay far, far away.Case ID: 09412236

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews indicate a strong focus on the technological advancements within the cryptocurrency ecosystem, particularly in areas such as staking, integrations, and the development of an Alliance module. Governance is a critical issue, with discussions centered on the management and regulatory structures of the crypto ecosystem. Market growth is highlighted through mentions of new partnerships and efforts to engage the community more deeply. Community interaction is also a key theme, with project spotlights and an emphasis on investor interest in diversification strategies. Potential areas for improvement or further investigation could include enhancing user understanding and participation in governance, expanding market growth strategies, and exploring new avenues for community engagement and education to foster a more robust and resilient cryptocurrency ecosystem.
